name: 5 Vegas - Gold Maduro - The Brick
additionalNotes: After 4 years of blending and re-blending, 5 Vegas Gold Maduro is here and ready to soothe you into tranquility. In a cigar world driven by ever more power, more spice, more head-spinning punch, 5 Vegas Gold Maduro brings something a bit different. Most cigar guys like an earth-shaking, powerful blend now and then; they also like ice cream too, but no one likes it shoveled by the gallon into their face. That's why this classic maduro answers the bell like few others: an uncanny level of smooth, rich, sweet flavors in concert with a remarkably mellow bouquet.
